name: 玛丽娜·米特罗法诺娃
name_full: 玛丽娜·米特罗法诺娃 Marina Mitrofanova

last_movies.title: 爱情是一切的罪魁祸首
叶卡捷琳娜大帝 第二季

introduction: Marina Mitrofanova is an aspiring Russian actress who plays in theater and cinema. For a relatively short period of time (the girl’s career began in 2013) she managed to play the main characters in the series “My Best Enemy”, “The Short Word“ No ”” and “Beautiful Life”.The first film actress was the role of a minor plan in the 8-part drama "Fool, if you love." In 2014, Marina was entrusted to play the main character, Irina Subbotina, in the successful Beautiful Life melodrama. At the same time the actress starred in the comic series "Family 3D." Hero of Mitrofanova name is Anya Dergunova.In 2015, the premiere of the melodramatic film “At the Far Outpost” took place, in which Marina played the daughter of V. Lozovoy Nastya. In parallel, the girl worked on the war paintings "Order" (role - Vasnetsova Varya) and "Last Frontier" (Daria). In 2016, Mitrofanova Marina appeared in a stunning 12-episode historical drama called “Catherine. Takeoff". The actress was casting for the role of Countess Sheremetyeva Anna Petrovna, who was the Empress's maid of honor.The next works of Marina were the crime scene “Crime” and the two-part melodrama “The Second Youth”. In 2017, fans saw the actress in the films “My Best Enemy” (role - Sonya) and “Short word“ no ”” (Korneyev Tata). In both paintings, Marina Mitrofanova got the performance of the main characters.The girl can be seen on the stage of the theater “Commonwealth of Taganka Actors”. She has several successful performances, including The Adventures of the Lion Cub, Chipollino and My Marat.
